attributes.action: Refuse visa to Narendra Modi, the Chief Minister of Gujarat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gujarat’s Chief Minister, Narendra Modi, has plans to visit London in May 2009. In view of his highly controversial profile and the possible danger that his visit might pose to ethnic relations here, we the undersigned urge the Prime Minister to declare him persona non grata and refuse him visa to enter into the UK.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
